snippet: Richard J. Holwell, who has served as a federal judge in Manhattan since 2003, is stepping down to set up his own law firm, Holwell Shuster & Goldberg.
abstract: Richard J. Holwell, who has served as a federal judge in Manhattan since 2003, is stepping down to set up his own law firm, Holwell Shuster & Goldberg.

headline.main: Judge in Rajaratnam Insider Trading Trial Is Leaving the Bench
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Leaves the Bench to Hang Up His Own Shingle
